author: mims
text: #OlotureTheMovie A mind blowing horror story to me. I was left in awe.

author: mims
text: The question right now, HOW DO WE DIG NIGERIA'S EDUCATION SYSTEM OUT OF THE DEEP HOLE IT'S IN?

author: mims
text: Millions of Nigerians are half educated and over 60 million are illiterate. On top of this, many eligible young Nigerians can't gain admission into public universities and at the same time prohibitive tuition fees are a barrier.

author: mims
text:
Let's talk education:
Nigeria's educational system is in assorted crises of infrastructural decay, neglect, waste of resources and sordid conditions of service. Over 10million out of school children which is the highest in the world,another 27million are performing very poorly.

author: mims
text: When people start a talk with "I don't have much to say", they actually do have much to say. Lol

author: mims
text:
Oral health is underated! 
I'm currently experiencing dry socket from a tooth extraction procedure!
Never felt pain like this before!

author: mims
text:
At some point, we all have been victims of societal stereotyping....
We should shun stereotyping because it breeds hate and prejudice!
See people for who they are!

#saynotostereotypes

author: mims
text:
Common stereotypes:
Gender profiling
Racial profiling
Culture
Sexual stereotypes 
 
Even if the stereotype is correct in some cases,constantly putting someone down based on preconceived perceptions is wrong on so many levels!

author: mims
text:
Stereotypes are often confused with prejudices, because like prejudices, a stereotype is based on major assumption. Stereotyping is not only hurtful, it is also very wrong.
Synonyms (hackneyed ideas,cliches........)

author: mims
text: STEREOTYPE: A preconceived notion especially about a group of people; could be positive or negative.
